entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
